alm5.name: Alm
alm5.title: Powerful Resolve
alm5.description: A young boy from Ram Village with the Brand on his left hand. Fights with resolve, determined to keep his oath he swore to Celica as a child. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: We need to move onward if we want to bring an end to this conflict.
People driven mad by Duma's power are repeating the tragedy of the past. Celica and I will end it at the source.
Thanks for your concern, but you needn't worry about me. I have more endurance than most.
What would you think of planting a vegetable garden at the castle? I'm pretty decent at working the fields.

I have faith that there will be a long future for Valentia, even if the gods abandon it.
To ensure that future, we will stop Duma ourselves.
Visit: I am Alm. I have been fighting alongside [F].
Level: I won't falter, even if the path ahead is a hard one. I will reshape Valentia and live in a better future with Celica!
I will grow stronger! I must, for I have something I wish to protect!
I was weak. I'll do better next time.
Summon: I am Alm. I hold the sentiments of my beloved Celica, Sir Mycen, and others I care for close to heart when I fight.
Learn Skill: Thank you. This is much better.
Confession:
Forced to make a choice between the world's future and Celica's, I believe I would choose Celica's.
That is what I fight for. It may come across as selfish, but I believe personal motivations are important.
Everyone fights to change the world for themselves and the people they care about. This is true in all worlds.
The passions of individuals bring them together to influence the world. I feel that this is how it should be.
Celica and I often talked as children about how we wished people could get along. That was all we wanted.
If our world continues to exist, I hope people can choose their paths and correct their own course as needed.
I wish to build that with Celica. We will till this land after the gods depart and work for a prosperous future.
Status: This attire, so similar to Celica's... I am glad to wear it.
Yes, Celica? Oh, it's you. Apologies for my confusion.
When we were little, Celica and I were together for a time in Ram Village.
I always felt as if someone was calling out to me. I'm sure it was her.
Gray and Tobin aren't here, are they? If they saw me, I'd never hear the end of it.
You are already part of me, Celica.
Do you think our meeting was fate? *chuckle* Or perhaps that's an exaggeration.

nuibaba.name: Nuibaba
nuibaba.title: Mistress of Fear
nuibaba.description: An arcanist who serves the Duma Faithful. Trades souls in exchange for a dark spell that brings death. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: I'll not let the likes of Jedah claim a bearer of the Brand. Such a soul could grant me life eternal!
That's right. All will be mine soon enough. Eeeeee hee hee hee!
I would like for us to talk more. You aren't trying to avoid me, are you?
Jedah even offered Lord Duma his own daughters to empower himself. Yes, it's true—Marla and Hestia both.
This land is filled with vigorous and spirited people. Plenty of offerings to choose from to please Lord Duma.
Visit: I am Nuibaba. I hear you are good friends with [F].
Level: Come to me. The real feast is yet to begin...when I dine upon your souls!
Eeeeee hee hee hee! The specter of love ever draws fools such as you like butterflies to nectar.
It cannot be... I won't be...
Summon: I am Nuibaba. Jedah placed me in charge of Fear Mountain. It pleases me to have been summoned by you.
Learn Skill: Excellent. To express my gratitude, I shall bestow Lord Duma's power upon you. Come to my abode...
Confession:
Father Duma's power is vast, and not to be looked down upon. I imagine you have seen enough to know that.
And it is your wish to use this power? Duma will make that wish a reality, and I will also give you my aid.
To that end, allow me to give you this mirror filled with my sorcery.
Of course, I believe you when you say you have no need for such... tricks, [S].
But one day you may find yourself cornered and without recourse.
If that day comes, shatter the mirror. It shall answer your call. May it turn the tides in your favor... Hee hee...
Status: Yes.
I am Nuibaba. Jedah placed me in charge of Fear Mountain.
My... I would advise against that. You never know when I might lose control of my sorcery.
The specter of love seduces all to ruin... Fools, each and every one.
The power of the child of fate's soul could grant me life eternal! *laugh*
Berkut and his bungling... Ugh... A useless prince.
All will be mine soon enough...
If you would taste of Duma's power, I will conduct the ceremony myself.

nomah.name: Nomah
nomah.title: Priest of Mila
nomah.description: The high priest of the Mila Faithful, a group influential in southern Valentia. Oversees the priory on Novis Island, and raises Celica as his own. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: Follow the path before you. Trust in it as I in you.
Zofia faces her darkest hour in some time. Sick and hungry come to the priory's door each day seeking aid...
I traveled to Rigel, long ago. That was when I first met Mycen. Ha! We were both so young back then...
What do you think of taking over the orphanage after me? I will welcome you anytime to Novis Island.
Now is the time to create a world of hope and possibility for the next generation. Don't you agree?
Visit: I seem to have found myself a little lost... Which way will take me to [S]'s castle?
Level: Life has taught me the limits of brute force. This was only possible because we have Mila's blessing.
I'm not so bad myself, am I? I won't lose to you little whippersnappers just yet.

Bah! Stop treating me like a frail old man with one foot in the grave!
Though I admit all this fighting DOES take a toll on my poor back.
Summon: I am Nomah. If this is a meeting of Mila's providence, then I shall follow wherever your heart leads me.
Learn Skill: Lithe as a willow branch, thanks to you. I won't forget this.
Confession:
I have no family of my own. I have dedicated my life to the teachings of Mila.
But I've had the chance to watch over Celica, Mae, Boey, and Genny... All such fine, noble-hearted youths.
They have given me so much joy. And I pray they'll each live out their lives unfettered and free... Though...
I did worry about Celica when she left the island, so I left too, for the first time in a long while, only to get lost.
Hm... And now, it is my back that is giving me trouble of late.
Bah! But don't treat me like a frail old man with one foot in the grave!
There is so much more I can do with you by my side. Yes... It is wonderful to be here, [S].
Status: Ah...
I'm Nomah, a sage from Novis. I'll be ready when you need me.
Ow! Hey! Ow! What ever happened to "respecting your elders"?
Zofia faces her darkest hour in some time. All I can do is put my faith in Celica.
I may be an old man, but I'm not done yet.
Mycen and I are old friends. And I know a few things about him he'd hate for me to tell you.
Celica, Boey, Mae, and Genny... Ah! The little ones have given me so much joy and a sense of purpose.
As long as you're fighting for a better tomorrow, I'll be at your side.

jesse.name: Jesse
jesse.title: Blithe Mercenary
jesse.description: A wandering, fun-loving mercenary who refuses to turn a blind eye to any woman in need. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: Grieth's payroll's a veritable who's who of Zofia's nastiest thugs.
They say Zofia's Deliverance chased off Desaix and the Rigelian army. That's actually pretty impressive.

Deen and Sonya are two of Grieth's best, but it's not loyalty that keeps 'em there.
I don't know the specifics, but it's clear they've their own ambitions.
The world's full of beauty. Only a fool doesn't enjoy it. Take women— the gods' most perfect creation.
The ladies in this army are fierce as hell AND gorgeous. I love it! All this motivation has me stir-crazy.
Visit: I'm Jesse, a wandering mercenary. Oh, and by the way, I'm currently working for [F].
Level:
Ruling the world with might and terror? Talk about your stale clichés.
What's the point in living if you're not having fun? I'm not about to find out.
So? Whaddaya think? This is what ya get from a merc who's been through his fair share of trouble.
Turns out it's a terrible idea to go off on my own tryin' to look cool...
Summon: Jesse. Just another mercenary of the unwashed-rogue variety. What's your story? Care if I join you?
Learn Skill: Ah, now this is nice! Hope you think so too, [S].
Confession:
Just thought I'd say hey, see what your deal is... Say, doesn't your face get tired from scowling all the time?
I mean, it must be rough bearing the weight of another person's life... I fled from that kind of responsibility.
I took off to find a place where I can live how I want, free from Zofia and Rigel.
No nobles! No commoners! Just a place for folks like us. Don't you think that's a good idea?
Whaddaya say? Wanna join me? We'll take you in, even if you're a wandering drifter.
I mean, it'll be a land of free people, after all!
Status: Haha!
Name's Jesse, by the way. I'm just your average garden-variety merc.
Whoa, pal. What're you doin' there?
The Deliverance chased off Desaix, didn't they? *laugh* That's pretty impressive.
Gotta keep my eyes peeled. Ya never know when someone cute'll appear. Really, I'm serious as a stab wound.
It's been forever since I've seen my family. Might never see 'em again.
I took off to find my own place where I can live how I want.
You're pretty fun, ya know? I got a feeling good things'll happen if I stick with you.

jedah.name: Jedah
jedah.title: Priest of Duma
jedah.description: The high priest of the Duma Faithful, a group influential in northern Valentia. Has received the protection of the god Duma and boasts arcane power beyond that of normal humans. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Castle Hall: Ah... So that is Alm?
I shall return all to the gods' control. It is the dawn of an age of fear and chaos, cradled in Duma's shadow!
Alm... Rudolf's worthless spawn... You're both disgusting heretics. How dare you wish harm on Duma!

Mila's kindness and mercy weakened the hearts and bodies of mankind, transforming them.
They became monsters bent on only satisfying their own desires. Can you claim that such a world is just?
I'm afraid what you ask is beyond my ability. Mila has sealed Falchion. We mortals have no say in the matter.
Visit: I am Jedah, servant of Lord Duma. Will you offer up your soul along with [F]?
Level: Now is the time. Offer your soul to Lord Duma as an offering for the second coming of the age of gods!
The hour is come for the world of man to return to the gods' control!

If you are displeased, I suggest you point your ire at Mila.
Lay blame upon the merciless goddess who forsook her Zofian children!
Summon: My name is Jedah. Offer your soul to the great Lord Duma. Obey him and kneel before his might!
Learn Skill: None know my true intentions. It may be that even I have lost sight of them.
Confession:
Lord Duma...is ill. Countless years of mortal idiocy have driven even the hearts of gods to madness.
We have reached a limit collecting feeble souls and shaping them into divine life.
It seems as though we need a soul that bears the fate of a Brand...
Without the gods' strength at its foundation, Valentia cannot sustain life, unlike a prosperous continent.
Do you see? I am both Lord Duma's faithful servant and he who shall be the world's savior!
Presumptuous human children let my mercy go to their heads. They throw tantrums without my approval.
You understand the proper way of things, do you not? Will you walk with me, [S]?
Status: I am Jedah, first disciple to the great and glorious Duma.
You seek audience with me of your own volition? Do you desire to sacrifice your soul to Duma?
Anthiese's soul is rare and precious—I must have it.
Rudolf and his worthless spawn are disgusting heretics. How dare they wish harm on Duma!
The Duma Faithful shall deliver Valentia from its depravity and ruin. When that day comes, I expect your thanks.
Sonya? Hm... I used to have a daughter by that name...
I will work alongside you, but only to assess whether you could be of use to Duma.
